content: पदं [पद्-अच्] {@--1@} A foot (said to be {%<ab>m.</ab>%} also in this sense); पदेन on foot; शिखरिषु पदं न्यस्य <ls>Me. 13</ls>; अपथे पदमर्पयंति हि <ls>R. 9. 74</ls> ‘set foot on (follow) a wrong road’; <ls n="R.">3. 50</ls>; <ls n="R.">12. 52</ls>; पदं हि सर्वत्र गुणौर्निधीयते <ls n="R.">3. 62</ls> ‘good qualities set foot everywhere’; {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} command notice or make themselves felt; जनपेद न गदः पदमादधौ <ls n="R.">9. 4</ls> ‘no disease stepped into the country’; यदवधि न पदं दधाति चित्ते <ls>Bv. 2. 14</ls>; पदं कृ ({%a%}) to set foot in, on or over (<ab>lit.</ab>); शांते करिष्यसि पदं पुनराश्रमेऽस्मिन् <ls>Ś. 4. 19</ls>; ({%b%}) to enter upon or into, take possession of, occupy (<ab>fig.</ab>); कृतं वपुषि नवयौवनेन पदं <ls>K. 137</ls>; कृतं हि मे कुतूहलेन प्रश्नाशया हृदि पदं <ls n="K.">133</ls>; so <ls>Ku. 5. 21</ls>, <ls>Pt. 1. 240</ls>; कृत्वा पद नो गले <ls>Mu. 3. 26</ls> ‘in defiance of us,’ (<ab>lit.</ab> planting his foot on our neck); मूर्ध्नि पदं कृ ‘to mount on the head of’, ‘to humble’; <ls>Pt. 1. 327</ls>; आकृतिविशेषेष्वादरः पदं करोति <ls>M. 1</ls> ‘good forms attract attention (command respect)’, जने सखी पदं कारिता <ls>Ś. 4</ls> ‘made to have dealings with (to confide in); धर्मेण शर्वे पार्वतीं प्रति पदं कारिते <ls>Ku. 6. 14.</ls> {@--2@} A step, pace, stride; तन्वी स्थिता कतिचिदेव पदानि गत्वा <ls>Ś. 2. 12</ls>; पदे पदे ‘at every step’; अक्षमालामदत्वा पदात्पदमपि न गतव्यं or चलितव्यं ‘do not move even a step’ &c.; पितुः पदं मध्यममुत्पतंती <ls>V. 1. 19</ls> ‘the middle pace or stride of Viṣṇu’; {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} the sky (for mythologically speaking, the earth, sky, and lower world are considered as the three paces of Viṣṇu in his fifth or dwarf incarnation); so अथात्मनः शब्दगुणं गुणज्ञः पदं विमानेन विगाहमानः <ls>R. 13. 1.</ls> {@--3@} A foot-step, foot-print, footmark; पदपंक्तिः <ls>Ś. 3. 8</ls>; or पदावली foot-prints; पदमनुविधेयं च महतां <ls>Bh. 2. 28.</ls> ‘the foot-steps of the great must be followed’; पदैर्गृह्यते चौरः <ls>Y. 2. 286.</ls> {@--4@} A trace, mark, impression, vestige; रतिवलयपदांके चापमासज्य कंठे <ls>Ku. 2. 64</ls>; <ls>Me. 35</ls>, <ls n="Me.">96</ls>; <ls>M. 3.</ls> {@--5@} A place, position, station; अधोधः पदं <ls>Bh. 2. 10</ls>; आत्मा परिश्रमस्य पदमुपनीतः <ls>Ś. 1</ls> ‘brought to the point of or exposed to trouble’, तदलब्धपदं हृदि शोकघने <ls>R. 8. 91</ls> ‘found no place in (left no impression on) the heart’; अपदे शंकितोस्मि <ls>M. 1</ls>, ‘my doubts were out of place’, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} groundless; कृशकुटुंबेषु लोभः पदमधत्त <ls>Dk. 162</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 72</ls>, <ls n="Ku.">3. 4</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 50</ls>; <ls n="R.">9. 82</ls>; कृतपदं स्तनयुगलं <ls>U. 6. 35</ls> ‘brought into relief or bursting forth’. {@--6@} Dignity, rank, office, station or position; भगवत्या प्राश्निकपदमध्यासितव्यं <ls>M. 1</ls>; यांत्येवं गृहिणीपदं युवतयः <ls>Ś. 4. 17</ls> ‘attain to the rank or position’ &c.; स्थिता गृहिणीपदे <ls n="Ś.">4. 18</ls>; so सचिव°, राज° &c. {@--7@} Cause, subject, occasion, thing, matter, business, affair; व्यवहारपदं हि तत् <ls>Y. 2. 5</ls> ‘occasion or matter of dispute, title of law, judicial proceeding’; <ls>Ms. 8. 7</ls>; सतां हि संदेहपदेषु वस्तुषु <ls>Ś. 1. 22</ls>; वांछितफलप्राप्तेः पदं <ls>Ratn. 1. 6.</ls> {@--8@} Abode, object, receptacle: पदं दृशः स्याः कथमीश मादृशां <ls>Śi. 1. 37</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">15. 22</ls>; अगरीयान्न पदं नृपश्रियः <ls>Ki. 2. 14</ls>; अविवेकः परमापदां पदं <ls n="Ki.">2. 30</ls>; के वा न स्युः परिभवपदं निष्फलारंभयत्नाः <ls>Me. 54</ls>; <ls>H. 4. 69.</ls> {@--9@} A quarter or line of a stanza, verse; विराचेतपदं (गेयं) <ls>Me. 86</ls>; <ls n="Me.">103</ls>; <ls>M. 5. 2</ls>; <ls>Ś. 3. 15.</ls> {@--10@} A complete or inflected word; सुप्तिंङंतं पदं <ls>P. I. 4. 14</ls>; वर्णाः पदं प्रयोगार्हानन्वितैकार्थबोधकाः <ls>S. D. 9</ls>; <ls>R. 8. 77</ls>; <ls>Ku. 4. 9.</ls> {@--11@} A name for the base of nouns before all consonantal case-terminations except <ab>nom.</ab> singular. {@--12@} Detachment of the Vedic words from one another, separation of a Vedic text into its several constituent words. {@--13@} A pretext; <ls>Śi. 7. 14.</ls> {@--14@} A square root. {@--15@} A part, portion or division (as of a sentence); as त्रिपदा गायत्री. {@--16@} A measure of length. {@--17@} Protection, preservation. {@--18@} A square or house on a chessboard; अष्टापदपदालेख्यैः <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--19@} A quadrant. {@--20@} The last of a series. {@--21@} A plot of ground. {@--22@} (In Arith). Any one in a set of numbers the sum of which is required. --दः A ray of light.
